channel.title: Goth Talk
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Goth Talk" - Ok, how long do I really have to wait?!

item.title: Re: Goth Talk
item.content:encoded: You have to wait at least 47 hours and 30 minutes. If it is longer than that it is all good (4 days is also good). Just read the page Goth Talk. It seems clear enough for me.

item.title: Goth Talk
item.content:encoded: Ok, I started the mission, now do I have to get around 48 hours, or could do the mission wait 4 days and then go back and complete it? Just for clarification, because I know the Main Page says it has been updated to 48 hours or more, not sure if that just means the 15 minute leeway or not. Please answer quickly.
